generated_body: In this article, the user can expect to read about Donald Trump's defense of his controversial remarks regarding former U.S. Ambassador Marie Yovanovitch. It may also explore the broader implications of his statements on diplomatic relations and public perception, alongside reactions from political opponents and supporters. The article could provide context about Yovanovitch's role and the significance of her criticism in the ongoing political discourse.
